div.p: >>> BACK OF THE BOOK SEGMENT TONIGHT.

AND THEY WANT TO HONOR THE PERSON WHO IS MOST PEACEFUL
PROMOTING PEACE AND YOU HAVE A BEEF?

JOHNS THE ARBITERS OF GOOD BAD OR PEACEFUL.
WHAT HAVE HE THEY GIVEN US SINCE THE VIKINGS.
THEY IS GIVEN US THE WORD QUIZ LING WHICH IS EXACTLY
WHAT THIS GUY IS HOW COUNTY PERPETRATOR PERPETRATOR OF

AT THE SAME TIME THIS GUY HAS ONE.

VIEW OUT THAT SNOW DEN, MIGHT BE NOMINATED HERE FOR
A NOBEL PEACE PRIZE. IT’S NOT A LOCK YET THOUGH,

>> THEY JUST PUT IT FORTH THAT SNOWDEN, THE GUY WHO

I WAS NOMINATED SIX TIMES. >> YOU WERE?
I DIDN’T KNOW THAT. >> I ACTUALLY REJECTED IT
BECAUSE I WAS BUSY I WAS IN BELEASE.
>> OBAMA DID WIN THE NOBEL PEACE PRIZE FOR -- ANYBODY
KNOW? NOBODY KNOWS.

>> NOBEL FOR COOL. >> I WONDER HOW THEY THINK
ABOUT THE DRONES THAT PRESIDENT OBAMA IS NOW
LOBBYING -- LOBBING ALL OVER THE GLOBE.
WHICH I SUPPORT. YOU DON’T LIKE THE SNOWDEN
POSSIBLE NOMINATION. NOW, GUTFELD ANOTHER OBSCURE
PROFESSOR, RIGHT WHO IS A PINHEAD IN YOUR MIND?
>> EMMETT EVANS. WORLD CLASS FOOD ASSISTANCE.
HE USES HIS OWN BOOK. INSIDE THE BOOK CLAIMS THAT

NOW, MY PIN HEAD OF THE WEEK IS, ARE YOU GUYS READY?

YOU CUT AWAY AT THE WRONG TIME, THE DIRECTOR JUST CUT AWAY.
MY PIN HEAD OF THE WEEK IS ME, ALL RIGHT?
AND HERE IS WHY. I’M NOW GOING TO PREDICT THE
WINNER OF THE SUPER BOWL. AND BY DOING SO I ALIENATE HALF
OF MY AUDIENCE, I’M JUST COMPELLED TO TELL YOU.
DENVER WILL WIN, UNLESS MARSHAWN LYNCH GETS AHEAD, DENVER SHUT

35 OR 40 DEGREES, THAT MEANS HE HAS A FAST TRACK.
I THINK IT WILL BE 17, IN THAT RANGE, THAT IS MY PREDICTION,
AND I’M A PIN HEAD, BECAUSE NUMBER ONE, LOOK AT ALL THE
SEATTLE FANS CURSING ME RIGHT NOW.
>> I HAVE A PREDICTION, DURING HALF TIME, THE MEMBER OF THE RED

HOVER ROUND AND BREAK A HIP. THEY’RE ALMOST 83 YEARS OLD, BUT

AND THEN YOU KNOW, THE PREDICTION.

I LIKE TO KEEP IT LOW KEY. THEY HAPPEN SO FREQUENTLY.
AND YOU WERE THE GUY WHO HELD UP YOUR DOBE BOOK IN THE BEGINNING.
